meanings.definition: Kikuyus - a member of a Bantu-speaking people of Kenya.
meanings.sent1: The Kikuyus are known for their rich culture and traditions.
meanings.sent2: Many Kikuyus live in the central region of Kenya.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Kikuyus bring a goat to the party? To share their traditional dance!
meanings.sent4: The Kikuyus are the heartbeat of Kenya's vibrant community.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the Kikuyus brightened up the festival.

meanings.definition: Kikuyus - the language of the Kikuyu people.
meanings.sent1: Learning Kikuyus helps me connect with my heritage.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Kikuyus start a band? To sing in their beautiful language!
meanings.sent4: The words of Kikuyus flow like a gentle stream.
meanings.sent5: The sound of Kikuyus being spoken is music to my ears.
